alert.note: Alert for Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 2:25PM CDT until June 26 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 225 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Claiborne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Claiborne, West Monroe, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Brownsville-Bawcom, Drew, Cheniere, Calhoun, Mineral Springs, Caderville, Eureka, Folksville and Lapine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
